form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Certification for Disability Exception, NARA #1115-02

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/17/2023 U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB #1115-0. Medical Certification for Disability Exception Part I. THIS SECTION TO BE COMPLETED BY THE APPLICANT (Please print or type information) Last Name First Name Amaya Middle Name Melida Social Security Number Address 261-99- 6022 13327 5 w 113 Ct Alien Number 1-090413717 City Miami State Zip Code Florida 33176 Telephone Number Date of Birth (305) 551-0190 Sex 03-07-06 I, authorize (Applicant's Name) to release all relevant physical and mental health information related to my medical status to the INS for the (Licensed medical doctor or licensed clinical psychologist) applying for an exception from the English language and U.S. civics testing requirements for naturalization. purpose I certi under penalty of perjury pursuant to Title 28 U.S.C. Section 1746, that the information on the form and any eviden submitted with it is all true and correct. I am aware that the knowing placement of false information on the Form N-6 and related documents may also subject me to civil penalties under 8 U.S.C. Section 1324c. Signature Date Part II. THIS SECTION TO BE COMPLETED BY A LICENSED MEDICAL DOCTOR OR LICENSED CLINICA PSYCHOLOGIST (see instructions) The individual named above is applying for an exception from the English language and U.,S. history and civics test required of applicants for naturalization. The Immigration and Naturalization Service's regulations require the applicants for an exception based on disability submit this certification form, completed by a licensed medical doctor 0 licensed clinical psychologist, along with a completed application for naturalization (Form N-400). and phrases. Please answer the following questions as clearly and completely as possible, using common terminology and complete word 1. Date of your most recent examination of the applicant. 4,22 19 $ 97 2. Is this your first examination of the individual? Yes No If yes, who is the regular attending physician? Dr. Francisco Albites 3. Based on your examination, describe any findings of a physical or mental disability or impairment which, in your professional medical opinion, would prevent this applicant from demonstrating knowledge of basic English language DSM diagnosis. and/or U.S. history and civics. Describe in detail. If applicant has a mental disability or impairment, please provide Transient Inchemic Attack gont impairment, Memory loss and Hypertinsion
